Class Trophy

java.lang.Object
trophy.Trophy
public class Trophy extends Object
Represents a trophy in the JEST game. Trophies are awarded based on specific conditions met by players' Jests.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea

    • Trophy

      Creates a trophy with a condition, type, and the card that defines it.
      Parameters:
      condition - Description of the trophy condition
      type - Type of the trophy
      trophyCard - The card that was drawn as trophy

  • Method Details

    • determineWinner

      public Player determineWinner(List<Player> players)
      Determines the winner of this trophy from the list of players.
      Parameters:
      players - List of players to evaluate
      Returns:
      The winning player, or null if no winner
